title: Casa Di Trevi Recalls Meat Pasta Products Produced Without Benefit Of Inspection And Due To Misbranding And Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, July 28, 2016 Gourmet Pasta Products USA, LLC, doing business as Casa di Trevi, a Roselle Park, N.J. establishment, is recalling approximately 845 pounds of meat pasta products that were packed, labeled, and distributed without the benefit of federal inspection, are misbranded, and contain...
